alert.note: Alert for Crook; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 13 at 6:21PM MDT until June 13 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE...WEST CENTRAL PENNINGTON...NORTHEASTERN WESTON AND SOUTHEASTERN CROOK COUNTIES... At 621 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Osage, or 17 miles northwest of Newcastle, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Inyan Kara Mountain, Buckhorn, Moskee, O`Neil Pass and Cement Ridge Lookout. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
